channel.title: Pandoroid Radio
channel.description: An open-source application for Android-based devices to interface with the Pandora Radio service.

item.title: New alpha version - updated API keys (v31)
item.description: After a long/brief hiatus, another release of Pandoroid is made available. This version includes the new API keys from the recent update by Pandora. Other stability and feature improvements are also included.

item.title: First public release
item.description: This is the first release of Pandoroid to the public. It was not very stable at all, but neat to play with.
